duties_responsibilities.duty: Compile and maintain accounts payable records, process supplier invoices, and obtain sign-offs for approval.
Verify prices, quantities, and terms on invoices, and accurately code invoices into the system.
Print required reports, maintain accounts payable files, and communicate with suppliers and vendors.
Analyze and reconcile accounts, assist in monthly closings, and comply with SOX/404 internal audit controls.
Support divisional and departmental business plans and goals, work within company policy, and assist with accounts receivable and special projects.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required. Associate degree preferred or equivalent additional experience.
